Hello WP Perk Support,

We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below:

https://support.combinate.me/requests/24452/satisfaction/new/2smQ8OCmaisDIo9M8bQd4zwzk?locale=1176

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

12 Mar 2021, 11:54 GMT+11

We're all good with the website updates, so we can now go ahead and close our ticket.

Thanks for all your help!

Regards,
Alyssa

No extra charges. All good.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -##

Your request (#24452) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below:
https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/24452

Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate)

10 Mar 2021, 14:28 GMT+11

Hi Heath,

Just as an additional enquiry, the Customer wants to know how much time it would take to add an additional File Upload field on our Booking page here:
https://ndip.com.au/booking/

The team wants to add the New field under the Privacy Policy bit below, and Label it "For Dentists - Please upload any relevant clinical files or documentation".

Let us know?

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate)

10 Mar 2021, 13:28 GMT+11

Thanks, Heath!

We'll send the estimates to our customer and let you know once we are ready to proceed.

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

Heath Maguire

10 Mar 2021, 12:58 GMT+11

Hi Alyssa,

Sure, we can do that within 30mins. Our hourly rate is $99/hr.

I have attached a screenshot of the users who have access to the site to add news posts etc. If the client is one of these, then yes, they can access. If they are not, let us know their email address and we can setup an account for them.

Let me know if you would like us to commence?

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wpperk.com

Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate)

10 Mar 2021, 12:38 GMT+11

Hi team,

I hope this finds you well. The client has sent the below additional changes for their website and is requesting for estimates. Are you able to look into these and advise, please?

https://ndip.com.au/for-dentists/
- Change the For Dentist menu item to 'News' - https://cbo.d.pr/X5SHVY
- News items to be categorised into two

- 'For Dentists'

- 'For Patients'

- Category to be accessible via the FE of the website for users (something like this https://cbo.d.pr/a0Adb8)

Are you also able to advise if the Client has access to add News items from their end?

Thank you and looking forward to hearing from you!

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate

www.combinate.me
